-gasp- I scan ff.net nearly every night after I do my homework for
Shinsengumi, Saitou&Tokio, or Aoshi (when I'm feeling meditative)
fiction...I missed this one...I started a Database of all ff.net
Shinsengumi related stories.

--- In SHQ@yahoogroups.com, Barbara Sheridan <bsher213@b...> wrote:
> I laughed when I read this because there's a fic on ff.net that has 
> Hijikata of all people hawking Shinsengumi related merchandise and one 
> of those things is---Shinsengummies! I believe they were sake
flavored.  
> *smirk*
